channel.title: Lost my saves, any way to unlock all the levels?
channel.description: I recently had an issue with my computer. I had to take it back to the store and exchange it. I lost all my saves and had to re-download all my games. I don't want to play all the way through again, so is there any way I can just start from where ever? I believe I was at chapter 13.

item.title: Lost my saves, any way to unlock all the levels?
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
This console command is also quite handy.

“sv_unlockedchapters *” * being the chapter number. IE 1 through to 14

Read full topic
item.source: Lost my saves, any way to unlock all the levels?

item.title: Lost my saves, any way to unlock all the levels?
item.dc:creator: grp215
item.description:
CPU:

Type “map” and then the mapname in your console.
EXAMPLE [COLOR=‘Red’]map bm_c1a0a
Here’s a list of the chapters/areas that were put together by elivance earlier to help you find what to type in.

Inbound
bm_c0a0a bm_c0a0b bm_c0a0c

an. materials
bm_c1a0a bm_c1a0b

unforseen con.
bm_c1a1a bm_c1a1b bm_c1a1c bm_c1a1d bm_c1a1e

office complex
bm_c1a2a bm_c1a2b bm_c1a2c

hostiles
bm_c1a3a bm_c1a3b bm_c1a3c

blast pit
bm_c1a4a bm_c1a4b bm_c1a4c bm_c1a4d bm_c1a4e

Power Up
bm_c2a1a bm_c2a1b

on a rail
bm_c2a2a bm_c2a2b bm_c2a2c

Appr…
bm_c2a3a bm_c2a3b bm_c2a3c

RP
bm_c2a4a bm_c2a4b bm_c2a4c

QE
bm_c2a4e bm_c2a4f bm_c2a4g bm_c2a4h

ST
bm_c2a5a bm_c2a5b bm_c2a5c bm_c2a5d bm_c2a5e bm_c2a5f bm_c2a5g

FaF
bm_c3a1a bm_c3a1b

Lambda core
bm_c3a2a bm_c3a2b bm_c3a2c bm_c3a2d bm_c3a2e bm_c3a2f bm_c3a2g bm_c3a2h

Thanks man

Read full topic
item.source: Lost my saves, any way to unlock all the levels?

item.title: Lost my saves, any way to unlock all the levels?
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
grp215:

I recently had an issue with my computer. I had to take it back to the store and exchange it. I lost all my saves and had to re-download all my games. I don’t want to play all the way through again, so is there any way I can just start from where ever? I believe I was at chapter 13.

Just replay it! I already did it three times…

Read full topic
